Extension tags

Summary
Extension tags
Introduction
Extension tags are tags which have specific code written to parse them.
List of extensions
Below is a list of all checks, and a short description of their function.

Introduction

Extension tags are tags which have specific code written to parse them.  They tend to represent larger structures in forms and can be used to specify a form more in terms of structure instead of writing a lot of HTML by hand.

List of extensions

Below is a list of all checks, and a short description of their function.  Each detailed description will list the tag template’s placeholders as well, or give a note that a template is not used for the tag.

Field(Field tag) Represents an input field with an associated label.
Group(Group tag) Represents a grouping of tags.
Columns(Columns tag) Represents a table of values.
Generated by Natural Docs
This tag represents an input field with an associated label.
This tag represents a grouping of several tags.
This tag represents a list of values in a table structure, with a column for each type of value.
